txt.en: Listen to the conversation
TBD Instance Rescue Viznak
<rgb=#FF0000>Faeron and Rhadrog must survive!</rgb>
Instance: Viznak Lives
'What lady? Dolenthol is a Man! A fellow Ranger!'
'Lady Éowyn? Does Captain Faramir know you're here?'
'He does not, and I would prefer to keep it that way! Now, I believe we should return to the tower.'
'If you promise not tell the others about Viznak, we have a deal.'
'Weapons at the ready, the merrevail must have followed us! We will save the explanations for another time!'
'Hah! Rhadrog can't tell! Are all tarks this stupid?'
'I can see that he is your friend. He most likely saved our lives in the Halls of Black Lore.'
Return to Faeron
The merrevail retreat!
'There. I believe he will live.'
Listen to the conversation
'I will do what I can, just keep them away from us!'
Defeat the merrevail
Faeron and Viznak are about to be overrun by merrevail and need your help!
'Is he right? Neither of us had ever seen you before. Who are you really, Dolenthol?'
'Rhadrog! I need help, he is seriously wounded.'
TBD
'The more rangers know my true identity, the harder it will be to maintain my deception. Alas, it was necessary to reveal myself to them. Let us return to the tower. The city continues higher still.'
'Your friend... is a goblin? You failed to mention this!'
'Viznak, why would you do that? You could have been killed!
With Rhadrog and Dolenthol in tow, you should return to Faeron and see how you can help.
Dolenthol has just learned that Viznak is actually a goblin.\n\nYou should listen to the conversation.
<rgb=#FF0000>Faeron has fallen!</rgb>
'Lady Éowyn!'
'We were unsure how you would react. [placeholder] assured me you could be trusted.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Rhadrog has fallen!</rgb>
You are under attack!\n\nDefeat the merrevail attackers!
Viznak has regained consciousness and is speaking with the Rangers.\n\nYou should listen to the conversation.
'What kind of king would I be if I let my subjects die? Waste of good bodyguards.... Who is this lady with you? Never seen her before.'
'Why risk your life for us?'
'Yes, my lady!'
'Ah, the time to reveal myself has come. Very well. You must promise not to tell the rest of the Rangers my true identity.'
'Aye. It was the second time he's saved my life.'
TBD

'The more Rangers there are that know my true identity, the harder it will be to maintain my deception. Alas, it was necessary to reveal myself to them. Let us return to the tower. The city continues higher still.'
